modal.title: Cookie settings
modal.descriptionPrefix: You can choose which cookies are set when you use our website by adjusting your preferences. For more information, please see our
modal.necessaryDescription: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be deactivated. Generally, they are only set in response to actions you take that correspond to a service request, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in, or filling out forms. Necessary cookies do not store any personal information.
modal.performanceDescription: These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so that we can measure and improve the performance of our website. They help us to see how visitors move around the site and what features they use. Any information they collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you choose not to use them, we will not know when you visited our site and will not be able to monitor its performance.

aiTranslation.title: AI translation
aiTranslation.description: Immediate download, {0} files remain this month.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.help: Didn't find your question? You can find the whole collection on our FAQ page. Or directly in the <link>Conversation</link> with us.

hero.title: We are rethinking translation
hero.description: Translate better, faster and more reliably with fused translation.

lead.large: With <highlight>AI</highlight> you can translate hundreds of words in seconds. But <highlight>only real language professionals</highlight> can verify whether the result actually says what it is supposed to.
lead.small: That's why we combine language AI and experienced translators in one place. For a seamless integration of artificial intelligence and human expertise - with you at the helm. At Supertext, AI efficiency meets professional expertise. Text security meets data security. Supertext is simple, customized and adaptive. Supertext is all-in-one.

featureList.title: Fused translation with Supertext: Your benefits

benefits.title: Everything on one platform
benefits.description: Our elegant and simple platform puts you in the driver's seat: place and track orders, manage teams and projects, manage subscriptions and payment methods.

benefits.title: Double security
benefits.description: Our language models learn quickly - and continue to adapt to your needs with every verified translation. For ever better quality at ever lower costs.

benefits.title: Efficiency meets flexibility
benefits.description: Our AI provides the reliable basis, our experts the certainty in verification. Unambiguous.

serviceList.title: To make sure your message gets across: our solutions.

sections.title: AI Translation in 23 languages
sections.description: Our online translator is based on the latest generation of in-house AI systems. They are proficient in 23 languages including local variants such as French (Switzerland). Fast, simple and in accordance with the highest security standards.

sections.title: Professional verification at the touch of a button
sections.description: Our online translator is based on the latest generation of in-house AI systems. They are proficient in 23 languages including local variants such as French (Switzerland). Fast, simple and in accordance with the highest security standards.

sections.title: Your personal AI that learns in real time
sections.description: Our language models learn quickly - and continue to adapt to your needs with every verified translation. For ever better quality at ever lower costs.

sections.title: Customized AI translation
sections.description: Your company, your voice. With targeted training, Supertext integrates your style guide and wording into every translation. For smooth communication without boundaries.

sections.title: Professional services from Arabic to Zulu
sections.description: When it really matters: our 3,000 experienced language experts write more beautifully and translate even more precisely. In your tone of voice, expressive and accurate in every language.

sections.title: Personal support
sections.description: Do you want to adapt your AI model to a new style guide? Or evaluate your current workflows with experts? We are there for you personally - solution-oriented, friendly and fast.

sections.title: Enhanced safety standards
sections.description: From single sign-on (SSO) to on-premises hosting - with Supertext you can keep your company data reliably under lock and key.

sections.title: Seamlessly integrated
sections.description: Integrate Supertext seamlessly into your working environment. With our APIs and integrations for lean processes in every interface.

caseList.title: From fully automated to handmade: we work for over 1500 companies throughout Europe.

footerNote.text: From a simple <highlight>Online translator</highlight> to the <highlight>fully integrated custom solution</highlight>: Find your <highlight>suitable subscription.</highlight>

items.title: AI translation & verification
items.description: From style guides to process optimization.

items.title: Specialized translation
items.description: From experienced specialists consetetur sadipscing elitr.

items.title: Copywriting & Content
items.description: For texts that work - full of ideas and to the point.

items.title: Proofreading
items.description: The finishing touch - stylish, fussy and really fast.

cards.title: Translate online. It's very simple.
cards.description: Communicate faster, better and easier. With Supertext, you can translate into more than 20 languages, from Japanese to Swiss German. Our translation AI is part of the latest generation of artificial intelligence, follows your style guide precisely and processes a wide range of file formats in seconds.

cards.title: Verified with one click
cards.description: Have important translations checked by professionals - in minutes instead of hours. Supertext connects you directly with over 3000 experienced linguists and cultural experts. So that your message gets across when it really matters.

cards.title: Uncompromisingly safe
cards.description: Supertext speaks many languages - and can remain silent in just as many. With the highest data management standards, robust encryption and the most secure servers, we always keep your data under lock and key. That's why we are the partner of choice for banks, authorities and insurance companies.

cards.title: Your company, your language
cards.description: Our translations are always tailored to your needs, style requirements and content formats. The result: smooth communication for your entire company. Unmistakable in every language.

cards.title: Seamlessly integrated
cards.description: Only a smooth user experience makes a tool a real added value. With our APIs, you can integrate Supertext seamlessly into your working environment and benefit from lean processes in every interface.

cards.title: Personal support
cards.description: Input, output? With Supertext you can do much more than that[AL1]. We are there for you personally - solution-oriented, friendly and fast. No matter whether you want to adapt your AI model to a new style guide or need a media release translated on the fly.

cards.title: Everything on one platform
cards.description: From fully automated to handmade: with Supertext, you decide. We combine innovative translation AI and experienced translators on one platform. A seamless integration of artificial intelligence and real language professionals - with you at the helm.

cards.title: Efficiency meets quality
cards.description: Increase your productivity sustainably with Supertext. Thanks to proven solutions that increase language quality and continuously reduce your costs. So that the numbers are right as well as the words.

cards.title: Your personal AI that learns in real time
cards.description: Your customized language models learn quickly - and adapt to your corporate language with every verified translation. Always up to date, so that your entire company speaks with one voice.

valueProposition.heading: We connect <highlight>Language AI</highlight> and <highlight>Human expertise</highlight> to create a seamless translation service. For individuals or entire teams. <highlight>What do you need?</highlight>

references.heading: 1500 companies throughout Europe: our references speak for themselves

footerNote.text: With Supertext, companies translate <highlight>better, faster, cheaper</highlight> and <highlight>safer</highlight>. From 0% to 100% automated.

hero.title: Experienced professionals - in top form thanks to Language AI
hero.description: Our language experts are ready for you. Whenever every word counts.

lead.large: <highlight>Fully automatic</highlight> or <highlight>handmade?</highlight> The answer often lies somewhere in between.
lead.small: With AI Translation, you can translate hundreds of words in seconds. And with our experts, you can be sure that every one of them is right. With Supertext, you can book support from experienced specialists as an add-on with just a few clicks. Whenever contextual knowledge in your specialist area and genuine passion are required. <break></break> <break></break> The big advantage: your AI learns with every professional project. And therefore constantly adapts to your language. For smooth communication exactly according to your specifications - and sustainably reduced costs.

featureList.title: Fused translation with Supertext: Your benefits

benefits.title: 20+ AI specialists, engineers and security professionals
benefits.description: Our tech team does pioneering work that pays off. We develop reliable, secure and flexible Language AI technology without compromise. It forms the basis for language quality on a grand scale, seamlessly integrated into every process and every interface.

benefits.title: 3,000 selected specialist translators, copywriters and proofreaders
benefits.description: From Geneva to Milan, from Buenos Aires to Tokyo: Supertext works with specialized native linguists worldwide. They all have a translation degree or more than five years of experience and undergo rigorous testing.

benefits.title: In-house language specialists for consistency and quality assurance
benefits.description: Permanently employed specialists provide internal expertise and quality control in the most important languages. They draw up guidelines, put together specialist teams for individual customers and are the first port of call when language issues arise.

benefits.title: Personal support from experienced project managers
benefits.description: Our project managers are the flexible hub for large projects and your direct line to Supertext. They ensure that your requirements are implemented precisely, deadlines are met and translated files are perfectly formatted in any format.

serviceList.title: Our professional services at a glance

sections.title: AI translation & verification
sections.description: Be sure that everything fits. With automatic transmission - and the professional check at the touch of a button.

sections.title: Specialized translation
sections.description: Technology meets experienced specialists. From InDesign to Word and from Arabic to Zulu.

sections.title: Copywriting & Content
sections.description: We start where you are at a loss for words. In your tone of voice, full of ideas and to the point.

sections.title: Proofreading
sections.description: The finishing touch for your text. Stylistically confident, fussy and really fast.

sections.title: Plain Language
sections.description: We also make technical texts easy to understand. For more trust and fewer support requests.

sections.title: Consulting
sections.description: Do you have big plans? We have the right solution in every language. From 0 to 100 % automated.

portraits.subtitle: PORTRAITS
portraits.title: Expertise from Å to Ž: Get to know our team

content.title: What are your tasks at Supertext?
content.text: Anything that involves language in any way. We verify AI translations, check the work of freelancers, but also develop workflows for clients with specific requirements. From quality checks and the development of style guides to the selection and maintenance of linguistic teams.

content.title: What makes a real Language Specialist?
content.text: In addition to linguistic talent, it is above all a keen interest in what technology has to offer. We use it to hone our skills and equip ourselves for everything our customers need. Our determination and attention to detail also drive us forward.

content.title: And how exactly do you ensure maximum voice quality?
content.text: Firstly, by relying exclusively on people with language studies and many years of experience. Secondly, by leaving nothing to chance and working tirelessly to ensure that every word is right. Sometimes it's really painful, but it's always worth it.

items.quote: "We also translate - especially customer wishes into language models."

content.title: What exactly does a Research Scientist do?
content.text: In short: translating customer requirements into action. By improving existing translation models on the one hand and developing specialized models on the other, which we tailor to our clients' corporate wording through training. We also develop new features based on the latest research findings.

content.title: How does such specialized training work - and what does it require?
content.text: We develop the model and customize it to the language and style of the company. For training, we need raw material - usually internal translation data from customers - and a broad knowledge of computer linguistics and coding. It takes about 6 weeks from start to delivery. In between, extensive testing is carried out and quality standards are checked.

content.title: What's the coolest feature you've helped develop so far?
content.text: Our dialect feature - translate to and from Swiss German including various dialects such as Züridütsch or Bärndütsch. The technology behind it was tricky, as there are relatively few texts for training in these languages.

footerNote.text: You want a <highlight>Style guide</highlight> for your company? Or 4000 <highlight>Translation projects</highlight> per month?

hero.title: Your career at Supertext
hero.description: How we work. Where we want to go. And how you become part of the whole.

lead.large: We love and live  <highlight>Language</highlight> and <highlight>Technology.</highlight> Every day anew. And are always on the lookout for <highlight>new talents</highlight>who tick in the same way. Ready to revolutionize the language industry with us?
lead.small: As an international AI language service provider, we have the privilege of handling projects for over 1500 companies across Europe. We drive change and develop solutions that redefine the status quo. With AI and human expertise at the heart of our work. <break></break> <break></break> Behind our language technology solutions is a team of over 100 experts in AI research, software, linguistics and project management. Driven by a constant exchange of knowledge and fast thinking and action.

featureList.title: Inside Supertext: How we are positioned

benefits.title: Language management
benefits.description: Our in-house specialists for the most important languages. They take care of quality control, are the first port of call for any language issues and actively work on improving our AI models.

benefits.title: Project management
benefits.description: The flexible hub for major projects and personal support for our customers. They ensure that requirements are implemented precisely, deadlines are met and translated files are perfectly formatted in every format.

benefits.title: Technology
benefits.description: Our development team programs individually for our customers - from specialized AI solutions and additional voice functions to personal system connections. Flexible and implemented in record time thanks to in-house development.

benefits.title: Vendor Management
benefits.description: The first point of contact for our external language professionals. They take care of the recruitment and evaluation of our freelancers and deal with any queries regarding collaboration.

benefits.title: Sales & Marketing
benefits.description: The two teams have one overarching goal: to drive our growth. Their tasks: Identify needs, provide content and solutions and create competitive offers.

benefits.title: Back office
benefits.description: The engine of our company, which ensures that everything runs smoothly, guarantees satisfaction and helps us to grow. Currently consisting of the following departments:

jobs.title: How to become part of the team: our vacancies
jobs.footerMessage: Didn't find the right job? Then convince us that we still need to get to know you. Send us your <bold>Unsolicited application</bold> to <bold><emailContact>people@supertext.com</emailContact></bold>.

article_one.title: Our <highlight>Diversity</highlight> makes us strong
article_one.description: We bring together countless cultures, languages, talents and interests in one place. This enriches our collaboration and makes us what we are: the all-in-one provider that finds a solution for every linguistic challenge. <break></break> <break></break> Working together as equals is just as important to us as fair pay and an open, flexible working environment. At Supertext, we organize ourselves in a self-determined way, take responsibility and contribute ideas that actively shape our culture. We use training and ongoing feedback to expand our knowledge and drive our personal development.

footerNote.text: You are <highlightText>Freelancer:in</highlightText> and would like to <highlightText>work with us?</highlightText>
footerNote.description: We are always on the lookout for copywriters, translators, SEO specialists and proofreaders to join our team of language professionals.

hero.title: Supertext - where language AI meets real expertise
hero.description: Our mission: We ensure maximum certainty in communication.

lead.large: AI tool or translation agency? We are both - and <highlight>together much more than that.</highlight>
lead.small: Supertext is an AI-based full-service language service provider with offices in Zurich and Berlin. More than 1,500 companies across Europe rely on our language solutions - from adaptive online translators to ISO-certified services for multilingual documents, websites, apps and multimedia campaigns.<break></break><break></break>Our team comprises over 100 specialists in the fields of artificial intelligence, linguistics, project management and security. We also have a select network of 3,000 freelance language professionals around the globe.<break></break><break></break>Together, we are developing a unique platform for texts and translations on which companies can combine the advantages of AI and human language expertise according to their needs. This is how we are redefining communication: efficiently, precisely and with maximum security - in terms of both content and data protection.

items.title: 1 All-in-one solution for automatic and professional translations in one place
1500 customers from all sectors and of all sizes
100+ in-house specialists in Zurich and Berlin
3,000 hand-picked language professionals around the globe
113 target languages on offer
4 ISO certifications for data security (ISO 27001), quality management (ISO 9001) and translation quality (ISO 17001/18587)
20 years in the business (since 2005)

members.title: Get to know our management team

footerNote.text: Would you like to <highlightText>Become part of the team?</highlightText>

hero.title: AI translation and verification
hero.description: Be sure that everything fits. With automatic transmission - and the professional check at the touch of a button.

lead.large: AI Translation is <highlight>simple, fast</highlight> and is constantly improving. But there is one thing that even in 2025 <highlight>only human experts will be able to do:</highlight> the accuracy of a translation <highlight>accuracy of a translation.</highlight>
lead.small: For important texts, Supertext connects you directly with over 3,000 experienced translators and cultural experts. With verification at the touch of a button, you can be sure in just a few minutes that your message will be received correctly. And you also receive a certificate for content and linguistic accuracy. Reliable, affordable and fast.

informationalPanel.title: AI translation meets professionals. What's inside?

items.title: AI translation at the cutting edge of technology
items.description: Our in-house translation systems form the basis. They belong to the latest generation of artificial intelligence and can handle 23 languages including local language variants.

items.title: Professional check by experienced experts
items.description: Our native-speaking professional translators ensure that the content of the translation corresponds exactly to the original - and also intervene linguistically where necessary.

items.title: Verified - and certified
items.description: As soon as the verification process is complete, you will receive the verified translation together with a corresponding certificate for download.

items.title: Translate text with AI and click on "Verify by expert"
Confirm order details (order flow + waiting screen)
Confirm order details (order flow + waiting screen)
3000 qualified native speaker experts
items.description: All of our specialist translators have a university degree in translation or at least five years of professional experience and pass an internal test.

items.title: Tested, standardized and awarded according to ISO standard
items.description: Supertext has been certified for translation quality (ISO 17100 and 18587), quality management (ISO 9001) and data security (ISO 27001) since 2018.

items.title: Uncompromisingly safe
items.description: With the highest data management standards, robust encryption and the most secure servers, we always keep your data under lock and key. That's why we are the partner of choice for banks, authorities and insurance companies.

items.title: Your personal AI that learns in real time
items.description: Our language models learn quickly - and continue to adapt to your needs with every verified translation. So that quality increases in the long term and your costs continue to fall.

footerNote.text: From a simple <highlight>Online translator</highlight> to the <highlight>fully integrated custom solution</highlight>: Find your <highlight>suitable subscription.</highlight>

hero.title: Supertext - where language AI meets real expertise
hero.description: Our mission: We ensure maximum certainty in communication.

lead.large: Our <highlight>LLM-based AI translation</highlight> belongs to the latest generation of artificial intelligence. It is developed in-house and can be efficiently <highlight>customized for your company.</highlight> With tangible benefits for you.
lead.small: Our custom translation solutions ensure measurably better language quality - as a working basis for your professional translators, fully automatically via our plugins and APIs and as a freely accessible online translator for all employees. We give your entire company its own voice. In any language and any format.

row1.title: Our Language AI: the flexible starting point
row1.description: Our Large Language Models (LLMs), which specialize in translations, form the basis for your individual translation tool. We start an individualized process from here.

row2.title: Specialized training - for simply better voice quality in the company
row2.description: We use your existing professional translations, terminology databases and style guides to create your personal language models - and train them precisely to your corporate language and tone of voice. The result: instant translations that are demonstrably better and more accurate.

row1.title: Better and better: your personal AI learns with you
row1.description: Your customized language models learn quickly - and continue to adapt to your corporate language with each new professional translation. Always up to date, so that your entire company speaks with one voice.

row2.title: In-house expertise from code to interface
row2.description: Our more than 20 in-house AI scientists and engineers do pioneering work that pays off. Thanks to in-house development, we can implement new languages and features in record time. Flexible, reliable and system-open in application.

tools.title: Precise translation - with our additional functions

row1.title: Word alternatives
row1.description: By clicking on a specific word, you will see several synonyms from which you can select the most suitable one.

row2.title: Reformulate
row2.description: Don't like a passage? Simply select several words and our system will automatically suggest different wordings.

row3.title: Formality
row3.description: You or you, informal or polite? Switch easily between formal and informal forms of address depending on your target group and style requirements.

row1.title: Gender-appropriate language
row1.description: If required, our translation models can be gendered for you at the touch of a button. Currently available in German and English.

row2.title: Length restriction
row2.description: Space problems? With our Character Limit feature, you can shorten the translated text to (maximum) the length of the original with a single click.

serviceList.title: We write SAFETY in capital letters in every language
serviceList.description: With the highest data management standards, robust encryption and multi-protected servers, we keep your data securely under lock and key. That's why we are the partner of choice for banks, authorities and insurance companies.

sections.title: ISO-certified for data security and more
sections.description: Supertext is certified for data security (ISO 27001), quality management (ISO 9001) and translation quality (ISO 17100 and 18587).

sections.title: Encrypted data transmission
sections.description: All data is transmitted in encrypted form and can never be viewed by third parties.

sections.title: Translations are not saved
sections.description: Your translation data is neither stored nor used to train our AI models.

sections.title: Single sign-on (SSO)
sections.description: Easily manage access to the translation system with your organization's existing user accounts.

sections.title: Private cloud or on-premises hosting
sections.description: With Supertext, you decide where your solution is hosted: on our servers, in the cloud of your choice or on your own hardware.

sections.title: User-defined TLS/SSL certificates
sections.description: For full control over the encryption of your data and seamless integration of Supertext AI Translation into even more systems.

integrations.title: Fully compatible with your system environment
integrations.description: Only a seamless user experience turns a tool into real added value. That's why we are constantly providing new plugins and a flexible RESTful API that allows you to integrate Supertext into any working environment in just a few steps.

blog.title: On the pulse of research
blog.description: From Master in Machine Learning to Ph.D.: As part of the global research community, we actively contribute to machine learning research.

footerNote.text: Experienced <highlightText>Professionals</highlightText> - in top form thanks to <highlightText>Language AI</highlightText>
footerNote.description: From computer linguists to language specialists: get to know the team behind Supertext.
